      • getId

        public short getId()
        Description copied from interface: ZCLCluster
        This method return the actual ClusterId. Please remember that the final and official ClusterId
        is defined by the Profile even if the Cluster is defined by a Cluster Library.
        Specified by:
        getId in interface ZCLCluster
        Specified by:
        getId in class ZCLClusterBase
        Returns:
        the ClusterId

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Specified by:
        getName in interface ZCLCluster
        Specified by:
        getName in class ZCLClusterBase
        Returns:
        This method return the String identifying the human readable name of the cluster.
        The name is assigned by the document defining the Cluster, either the Cluster Library or
        or the Profile

      • getStandardAttributes

        public Attribute[] getStandardAttributes()
        Description copied from interface: ZCLCluster
        This method returns an Attribute array containing the Attribute defined by
        the specification of the cluster. Hence, this method returns all Attribute defined
        either as Mandatory or as Optional, but does not return the Attribute
        defined by the Manufacturer.
        Specified by:
        getStandardAttributes in interface ZCLCluster
        Specified by:
        getStandardAttributes in class ZCLClusterBase
        Returns:
        The Attribute arrays
